mapper.insert: insert into rank (username, chineseName, primaryScore, secondaryScore, phone, school, institute, major) values (#{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{chinesename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{primaryscore,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{secondaryscore,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{school,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{institute,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{major,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update rank set chineseName = #{chinesename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, primaryScore = #{primaryscore,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, secondaryScore = #{secondaryscore,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, school = #{school,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, institute = #{institute,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, major = #{major,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select username, chineseName, primaryScore, secondaryScore, phone, school, institute, major from rank where username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select username, chineseName, primaryScore, secondaryScore, phone, school, institute, major from rank
